definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons

sentences.english: The agreement still requires ratification from the full Senate and the Russian Duma.
sentences.chinese: 该协议仍然需要参议院全体议员和俄罗斯杜马的批准。

sentences.english: The 435 members of the House are elected every two years.
sentences.chinese: 最少每五年举行一次普选来选举下议院议员。

sentences.english: The bill, which has 31 co-sponsors, has been forwarded to the House Ways and Means Committee for consideration.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案已提交众议院筹款委员会审议。

sentences.english: In the wake of the scandal, the senator's one-time adherents quietly deserted him.
sentences.chinese: 因为丑闻，该参议院昔日的追随者悄然弃他而去。

sentences.english: He became a Congressman at the young age of 29 and brought his frontier swagger to the Senate a year later.
sentences.chinese: 他29岁成为议员并在一年后昂首阔步进入参议院。

sentences.english: The lawmaking power was divided between two legislative houses.
sentences.chinese: 立法权在两个议院之间分配。

sentences.english: The Senate later passed the legislation.
sentences.chinese: 参议院后来通过了原来打算讨论的立法。

sentences.english: The House (ie Members of the House of Commons) rose at 10 pm.
sentences.chinese: 下议院已于晚上10点钟散会。

sentences.english: HW1. The Illinois House impeaches Governor Rod Blagojevich.
sentences.chinese: 伊利诺亚州众议院弹劾了州长罗德。

sentences.english: But the previous day the Senate threw down the gauntlet to China.
sentences.chinese: 但是前一天，参议院对中国发起了挑战。

sentences.english: The senate had a session today with closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 参议院今天召开一次秘密会议。

sentences.english: The Senate shall have the sole Power to try all Impeachments.
sentences.chinese: 唯参议院具有审判一切弹劾案之权。

sentences.english: But he has not lost control of the upper-house Senate.
sentences.chinese: 但是他仍能掌控上议院。

sentences.english: The Senate adjourned for the summer.
They simply threatened to filibuster until the Senate adjourns.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅威胁说要发动抗争直到参议院休会。

sentences.english: Climate bill - which would bring cuts of 4% from 1990 levels by 2020 - is bogged down in Senate
sentences.chinese: 本国气候变化法案正在参议院审议中搁置。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
